head.title: When the First Stop Is the E.R.

hedline.hl1: When the First Stop Is the E.R.

abstract.p: Joe Martin letter on Oct 25 article calls for universal health care system in United States; drawing

block.p: Your Oct. 25 front-page article about the increased use of emergency rooms by growing numbers of desperate people provides yet another argument for a coherent and universally accessible system of health care in this nation.

The current system, driven by the profit motive and the bottom line, is a fiasco. While it is encouraging that some hospitals in some parts of the country are doing their best to meet the needs of growing numbers of poor and uninsured individuals, this situation cries out for a complete and comprehensive restructuring of how medical care is delivered.
